import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SignUp=()=>{const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[otp,setOtp]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[confirmPassword,setConfirmPassword]=useState('');const[isEmailVerified,setIsEmailVerified]=useState(false);const[otpSent,setOtpSent]=useState(false);const[errorMessage,setErrorMessage]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();const{login}=useAuth();const handleGoogleSignIn=useCallback(async response=>{const userObject=jwtDecode(response.credential);const googleEmail=userObject.email;setEmail(googleEmail);// Directly create an account with Google email
